    • character.Character
      • player.Playable

    public class Playable
extends Character
implements java.io.Serializable
    A playable character, can get experience and level up

      • addExp

        public void addExp(double e)
        Adds experience to the player. Calls checkForLevel(), if it returns true: calls doLevelUp()
        Parameters:
        e - amount of experience to give the player.

      • setExpTnl

        private void setExpTnl()
        Sets the expTnl based on your current level

      • checkForLevel

        private boolean checkForLevel()
        Checks if a level up has occurred
        Returns:
        if a level up has occurred or not

      • doLevelUp

        private void doLevelUp()
        Does a level up, currently increases all attributes by 1. Recursive, checks itself for another level up.
